example.eg: The study will compare the quality of care of the hospitals.
example.egtrans: 这一研究将对各医院的护理质量进行比较。

example.eg: We compared the results to those of previous tests. Critics have compared his films to those of Hitchcock.
example.egtrans: 我们把该结果与之前的测试结果进行了比较。评论家们已经把他的电影与希区柯克的进行了比较。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…与…进行比较, 将…与…进行对照

example.eg: When you compare ice cream with cake, it's clear that ice cream is the better dessert.
example.egtrans: 冰淇淋和蛋糕相比，肯定冰淇淋是更好的甜点。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…与…相比, 拿…和…比较

dsense.name: compare⇒
dsense.guideword: often negative (be as good) (常做贬义)

example.eg: Once you've heard her singing the part, no other voice can really compare.
example.egtrans: 你听她唱过那部分以后，就会觉得没有其他人能比得上她。

example.eg: This food does not compare with dinner at a good restaurant.
example.egtrans: 这顿饭菜比不上好餐厅的晚餐。

example.eg: The sweetness of her voice is beyond compare.
The countryside is lovely beyond compare.
The article compares and contrasts the works of Plato and Aristotle.
We met up for lunch to compare notes on our new boss.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 就...交流思想, 就...交换意见
